full_summary:
Gateway Utilization Concept Studies RFP

**Reference Number**
WS3771540997-Doc3771618374

**Solicitation Number**
WS3771540997

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Overview**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) are soliciting proposals to perform concept studies on Gateway Utilization.

**Request**
The government is seeking a contractor with expertise in space engineering to provide concept studies on Gateway utilization. The contractor will be required to present a proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and any relevant technical expertise.

**Specifications and Requirements**
The proposed concept studies should include the following:

* Technical merit and feasibility evaluations
* Cost and budget estimates
* Recommendations for the implementation of Gateway utilization

**Evaluation Criteria**
Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of technical merit, with the government reserving the right to select the most deserving proposals. Technical merit will be assessed based on the following criteria:

* Expertise in space engineering
* Innovation and creativity
* Ability to provide timely and cost-effective solutions

**Submission Information**

* Contact Information: Laliberte Seyer, Arlow (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [arlow.laliberteseyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:arlow.laliberteseyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14787060?extsite=MTQ3ODcwNjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Eligibility**
Only contractors who meet the specified requirements and have a demonstrated expertise in space engineering will be considered for evaluation. The government reserves the right to waive any of the requirements or to request additional information or clarification during the evaluation process.

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-02-10 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-04-03
* Expected Contract End Date: None
